title: FDA D.I.S.C.O. Burst Edition: FDA approvals of Augtyro (repotrectinib) for NTRK gene fusion-positive solid tumors and Krazati (adagrasib) for KRAS G12C-mutated colorectal cancer
summary: Listen to a soundcast of the June 13, 2024, and June 21, 2024, Augtyro (repotrectinib) for NTRK gene fusion-positive solid tumors and Krazati (adagrasib) for KRAS G12C-mutated colorectal cancer.

title: FDA D.I.S.C.O. Burst Edition: FDA approvals of Tecentriq (atezolizumab) for unresectable or metastatic alveolar soft part sarcoma, and Krazati (adagrasib) for KRAS G12C-mutated locally advanced or metastatic non-small cell lung cancer
summary: Listen to a soundcast of the December 9 and 12, 2022, FDA approvals of Tecentriq (atezolizumab) for unresectable or metastatic alveolar soft part sarcoma, and Krazati (adagrasib) for KRAS G12C-mutated locally advanced or metastatic non-small cell lung cancer”

title: FDA D.I.S.C.O. Burst Edition: FDA approval of Vijoice (alpelisib) for adult and pediatric patients two years of age and older with severe manifestations of PIK3CA-related overgrowth spectrum who require systemic therapy
summary: Listen to a soundcast of the 4/5/2022 FDA approval of Vijoice (alpelisib)  for adult and pediatric patients two years of age and older with severe manifestations of PIK3CA-related overgrowth spectrum who require systemic therapy.

title: FDA D.I.S.C.O. Burst Edition: FDA approvals of Verzenio (abemaciclib) for adjuvant treatment of adult patients with hormone receptor-positive, human epidermal growth factor receptor 2-negative, node-positive, early breast cancer, & Keytruda (pembrolizumab) for persistent, recurrent or metastatic cervical cancer whose tumors express PD-L1 (CPS ≥1)

title: FDA D.I.S.C.O. Burst Edition: FDA approvals of Lumakras (sotorasib) for patients with KRAS G12C  mutated locally advanced or metastatic non-small cell lung cancer, and Truseltiq (infigratinib) for unresectable locally advanced or metastatic cholangiocarcinoma with a fibroblast growth factor receptor 2 fusion or other rearrangement
summary: Listen to a soundcast of the May 28, 2021, approvals of Lumakras for patients with KRAS G12C‑mutated locally advanced or metastatic non-small cell lung cancer, and Truseltiq for unresectable locally advanced or metastatic cholangiocarcinoma with a fibroblast growth factor receptor 2 fusion.

title: FDA D.I.S.C.O. Burst Edition: FDA approvals of Trodelvy (sacituzumab govitecan) for locally advanced/metastatic urothelial cancer who received platinum-containing chemotherapy & either PD-1/PD-L1 inhibitor and Opdivo (nivolumab) in combination with chemotherapy for metastatic gastric cancer and esophageal adenocarcinoma
summary: Trodelvy (sacituzumab govitecan) for locally advanced/metastatic urothelial cancer who received platinum-containing chemotherapy & either PD-1/PD-L1 inhibitor. Opdivo (nivolumab) in combination with chemotherapy for metastatic gastric cancer and esophageal adenocarcinoma.

title: FDA D.I.S.C.O. Burst Edition: Libtayo (cemiplimab-rwlc) for first-line treatment of patients with advanced NSCLC (locally advanced who are not candidates for surgical resection or definitive chemoradiation or metastatic) whose tumors have high PD-L1 expression with no eGFR, anaplastic lymphoma kinase or receptor tyrosine kinase aberrations
summary: Listen to a soundcast of the February 22nd 2021 FDA approval of Libtayo (cemiplimab-rwlc) for first-line treatment of patients with advanced NSCLC (locally advanced who are not candidates for surgical resection or definitive chemoradiation or metastatic) whose tumors have high PD-L1 expression

title: Lumea to Incorporate Myriad Genetics Cancer Tests Into Digital Pathology Platform
summary: Under the collaboration, the firms will make Myriad's Prolaris prostate cancer and MyRisk hereditary cancer tests available through Lumea's BxLink digital pathology platform.

summary: Under the collaboration, the firms will make Myriad's Prolaris prostate cancer and MyRisk hereditary cancer tests available through Lumea's BxLink digital pathology platform.

title: Natera MRD Study Results Demonstrate Potential to Ressurect Failed Adjuvant Drugs
summary: The company analyzed MRD status in samples from a prior failed study, showing a significant benefit from the drug for ctDNA-positive patients.

title: Lumea to Incorporate Myriad Genetics Cancer Tests Into Digital Pathology Platform
summary: Under the collaboration, the firms will make Myriad's Prolaris prostate cancer and MyRisk hereditary cancer tests available through Lumea's BxLink digital pathology platform.

title: Angle Looks to Dual CTC, ctDNA Analysis, Illumina Tie-up to Expand Cancer Dx, CDx Business
summary: Assaying both CTCs and ctDNA simultaneously offers a path to more accurate and early cancer detection and drug response monitoring.

title: Aiosyn Growing Team, Ramping up Sales of Breast Cancer Mitosis Detection Tool
summary: The digital pathology software developer is raising funding that would help it to increase its head count and support its Aiosyn Mitosis Breast application.

title: Roche, Abbott, Inflammatix, Paige, Others Gain 510(k) Clearances in January
summary: The US Food and Drug Administration in January granted 510(k) marketing clearances for a 30-minute sepsis test, digital pathology software, and various infectious disease tests

title: Perspective: Neurofilament Light as a Biomarker in Mouse Models to Advance Research in Neurological Disorders
summary: The ability to measure NfL levels with high sensitivity in mouse models is transforming how researchers study neurological disorders, allowing for earlier and more precise insights into disease mechanisms and therapeutic responses.

title: Foundation Medicine, Sumitomo Pharma to Develop CDx for Acute Leukemia Treatment
summary: The companies will use the FoundationOne Heme platform to identify patients with acute leukemia who have a KMT2A rearrangement or NPM1 mutations.

title: Foundation Medicine, Sumitomo Pharma to Develop CDx for Acute Leukemia Treatment
summary: The companies will use the FoundationOne Heme platform to identify patients with acute leukemia who have a KMT2A rearrangement or NPM1 mutations.

title: Veracyte Eyes Dropping IVD/Pharma Subsidiary in Europe As Growth Concentrates Among Clinical LDTs
summary: Company officials lauded its core tests and shared news about launches planned for the upcoming year, including its minimal residual disease assay.

title: Veracyte Eyes Dropping IVD/Pharma Subsidiary in Europe As Growth Concentrates Among Clinical LDTs
summary: Company officials lauded its core tests and shared news about launches planned for the upcoming year, including its minimal residual disease assay.

title: BridgeBio's KRAS-focused cancer spinout backs SPAC as path to Nasdaq
summary: For a while, special purpose acquisition companies were biotech’s hot ticket to the public markets. While interest in this path has died down in recent years, BridgeBio’s former cancer unit thinks it could work for them.

title: Epredia Gains FDA 510(k) for Digital Pathology Imaging System
summary: The firm's E1000 Dx Digital Pathology Solution consists of an automated scanner, whole-slide image viewer, and image management and viewing software.

title: Foresight Diagnostics Launches Trial of MRD-Guided Treatment in Hodgkin Lymphoma
summary: Researchers are testing whether the Clarity ctDNA test can reliably identify patients who do just as well long term with less chemotherapy.

title: Tethis, Sheba Medical Center Trying to Predict Rectal Cancer Relapse Earlier With CTCs, ctDNA
summary: Sheba researchers will use Tethis' technology to prepare patients' blood samples for circulating tumor cells and circulating tumor DNA analysis.

title: Agilent Technologies Gains Expanded IVDR Certification for PD-L1 CDx
summary: The test has been certified for use in the EU to help guide the treatment of early-stage non-small cell lung cancer and previously untreated advanced melanoma.

title: Roche, Abbott, Hologic, Cepheid, Others Gain 510(k) Clearances in February
summary: The US Food and Drug Administration granted last month clearances for a preeclampsia risk test, respiratory disease tests, and a digital pathology system, among others.

title: Pharma, Dx Leaders Urge MRD Community to Focus on Clinical Utility as Use in Trials Grows
summary: A discussion at last week's Precision Medicine Tri-Con demonstrated that stakeholders are narrowing in on the challenges to realizing the promise of solid tumor MRD.

title: Pharma, Dx Leaders Urge MRD Community to Focus on Clinical Utility as Use in Trials Grows
summary: A discussion at last week's Precision Medicine Tri-Con demonstrated that stakeholders are narrowing in on the challenges to realizing the promise of solid tumor MRD.

title: Prosica Nabs $50M in Funding to Support Commercialization of Digital Pathology Software
summary: The firm said that the money will support work with OEM partners and the expanded development and integration of artificial intelligence-based tools.

title: Epredia Bolsters Cancer Testing Menu With High-Throughput Digital Pathology System
summary: The precision cancer business of PHC Holdings anticipates an increase in cancer cases and is expanding its digital pathology and immunohistochemistry instrument lineup.

title: Gestalt, Primaa Partner on AI-Based Testing for Skin Cancer
summary: The firms said that they will integrate Primaa's skin cancer testing algorithms with Gestalt's PathFlow digital pathology software platform.

title: Craig-Hallum Initiates Coverage of Veracyte With Buy Rating, $45 Price Target
summary: The investment bank views the company as a promising target with a strong track record and prospects for expansion into new, under-penetrated markets.

title: Executive Q&A: NCCN Recommends ctDNA MRD Testing for Diffuse Large B-Cell Lymphoma
summary: In this GenomeWeb Executive Q&A, Foresight Diagnostics’ chief operating and compliance officer Sandra Close and chief business officer John Truesdell discuss the new guidelines, how they may change the treatment journey for diffuse large B-cell lymphoma patients, and Foresight's approach to establishing the clinical utility of its tests.

title: Craig-Hallum Initiates Coverage of Veracyte With Buy Rating, $45 Price Target
summary: The investment bank views the company as a promising target with a strong track record and prospects for expansion into new, under-penetrated markets.

title: Proscia Nabs $50M in Funding to Support Commercialization of Digital Pathology Software
summary: The firm said that the money will support work with OEM partners and the expanded development and integration of artificial intelligence-based tools.

title: Siemens Healthineers Gains FDA 510(k) Clearance for Blood Clot Drug CDx
summary: The firm's Innovance Antithrombin assay is used to monitor antithrombin activity levels in hemophilia patients and aid dosing decisions for a routine prophylaxis.

title: New Data Promising for Veracyte on Path to Launch Whole-Genome Sequencing MRD Test
summary: The company welcomed favorable results last week from a study comparing its test to a narrower ddPCR-based approach in patients from an ongoing interventional trial.

title: New Data Promising for Veracyte on Path to Launch Whole-Genome Sequencing MRD Test
summary: The company welcomed favorable results last week from a study comparing its test to a narrower ddPCR-based approach in patients from an ongoing interventional trial.

title: Pillar Biosciences Receives CMS Coverage for Pan-Cancer CDx Assay
summary: The firm's next-generation sequencing-based test detects single nucleotide variants, insertions, and deletions in 22 genes.

title: Proscia Using $50M Fundraise to Expand Staff, Bolster AI Tools Menu
summary: The firm said that investors provided better-than-expected backing as the company anticipates growing use of its digital pathology platform in 2025.

title: Source BioScience Acquires Cambridge Clinical Laboratories
summary: UK-based Source Bio said the deal will expand its existing molecular diagnostics, digital pathology, and clinical trial support service portfolio.
